price: [Сулаймон] гуфт: «Хоҳем дид, ки оё рост гуфтаӣ ё дурӯғгӯӣ
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
